story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_0300_10:
I simply made the decision that was best
for Team Galactic.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_0500_10:
But...if Team Galactic is anything like the
Galaxy Expedition Team, I’m sure even
if there were nothing in it for you...
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_0700_10:
I will pass down the name of our team,
and tales of its accomplishments...
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_0800_10:
How you can place such trust in thoughts
and hopes that are uncertain is
beyond me.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Paulo told me what you two were
thinking.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1200_10:
In the end, it seems our actions only
spurred Volo on.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1300_10:
I’m so sorry. If only I’d been more
careful.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1500_10: You were just doing what you had to.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1600_10:
I’m the one who should apologize,
for dragging Paulo into all this.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1700_10:
You didn’t do anything wrong, Rei!
If anything, I should’ve—
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_1900_10:
I should’ve talked to everyone before
it came to this, rather than keep it a
secret.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I can’t believe Volo tried using Arceus’s
power for evil.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2200_10:
I suppose all we can do is show him the
strength of a true bond.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Let’s get more of us to awaken our arc
suits, to force him to reconsider. It’s all
we can do.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2700_10:
According to legends, Arceus banished it
to the other side of this world.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2800_10:
So Giratina may have objected to me
using Arceus’s power.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_2900_10: If so...I’m also responsible for this.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_3000_10:
I should’ve considered Giratina’s feelings,
too.
story_arceus_06_11000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I’ll definitely regain Giratina’s trust.
Just you wait!
